component_locations.PageTitle: top left of the content page
component_locations.ProjectStarCTA: bottom last of the center section takes full width
component_locations.InfoCard: bottom above projectstarcta takes full width of the center section
component_locations.Table: top below pagetitle of the center section takes full width of center section
component_locations.ChartCard1: mid left of the center section takes 1/2 width
component_locations.ChartCard2: mid right of the center section takes 1/2 width

functionality.table_pagination: a feature that allows the table to be paginated
